all.description: Technological advancements shape our daily life, from the way we communicate to how we function. This also applies within the laboratory. Scientists’ interactions with technology are shaping the ways in which research is conducted, for the better. Whether through hardware or software, lab scientists’ routines are adapting to the changing lab environment, through lab digitization and automation. This tends to make labs less prone to errors, while improving the outcome of research. Hence lab digitization and automation have considerably enhanced the integrity of research.
